commands_raw:
Good evening.
signal(set_bool,intro_given,true)
Is your shi... [i]ow[/i]... shift going well?

?> Yes. -> ans1
?> No. -> ans2
?> Long night? -> ans8
?> I ask the questions. -> ans3
name: Q0

commands_raw:
Fantastic, that is great to hear.
---
-> Q1
name: ans1

commands_raw:
Apologies, I hate it when that happens.
---
-> Q1
name: ans2

commands_raw:
Absolutely, I didn't mean to offend.
---
-> Q1
name: ans3

commands_raw:
Have you ever traveled through the Smeld? It's... amazing.
---
I hope more people get to experience it.

?> Yes. -> ans4
?> No. -> ans5
?> I don't trust it. -> ans7
?> I ask the questions. -> ans6
name: Q1

commands_raw:
Ah, so you've seen him too.
---
-> question_hub
name: ans4

commands_raw:
I highly recommend it. It's been lifechanging.
---
-> question_hub
name: ans5

commands_raw:
Ah, I'm sorry. I'll keep that in mind.
---
-> question_hub
name: ans6

commands_raw:
Understandable, I hope one day you'll change your mind.
---
-> question_hub
name: ans7

commands_raw:
Is there anything else you require?

?> What is your name? -> Name
?> How old are you? -> Age
?> What is your job? -> Job
?> Where are you traveling? -> Reason
?> Have you experienced anything strange? -> Phenomena
?> That's all for now. -> end_node
name: question_hub
Name
start
Age

commands_raw:
$if answered_job {
Oh a little of this, a little of that.
---
Mostly I meet people, and things.
---
I'm a [b]"people"[b] person.
}
$else {
I'm nobody. Just a... ow... friend.
---
I mostly just try to meet great people like you.
---
Hope you're enjoying meeting me.
signal(set_bool,asked_job,true)
}
---
-> question_hub
name: Job

commands_raw:
$if answered_reason {
The travel was reason enough, sir.
I got what I came for.
}
$else {
Sincerely, the Smeld is reason enough.
---
It's such an incredible sight.
---
You should give it a try.
signal(set_bool,answered_reason,true)
}
---
-> question_hub
name: Reason

commands_raw:
$if answered_phenom {
Anything strange?
---
I wouldn't say that.
---
There's nothing strange about what goes on in there.
It's [i]beautiful[/i].
}
$else {
There's nothing strange about it.
---
If I could, I would call it home.
---
I hope everyone gets the courage to find out what it's like.
It's [color=#f8ff33][i]beautiful[/i][/color].
signal(set_bool,answered_phenom,true)
}
---
-> question_hub
name: Phenomena

commands_raw: It's been a pleasure.
name: end_node

commands_raw:
Thank you, sir.
---
May the rest of your days shine bright.
name: approved

commands_raw:
Well this is certainly unexpected...
---
Maybe you'll come to your senses eventually.
---
Or not.
name: denied

commands_raw:
Sorry, my head's been killing me lately.
---
Small price to pay.
---
-> Q1
name: ans8
